com.buschmais.xo.api

Interface Query<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The return type of the query.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XOQueryImpl

    public interface Query<T>
    Defines a query using a fluent API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Query.Result<T>
      Defines the result of a query.

      • withParameter

        Query<T> withParameter(String name,
                       Object value)
        Bind a parameter value to the query.
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name.
        value - The parameter value.
        Returns:

      • withParameters

        Query<T> withParameters(Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Bind a map of parameter values to the query.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The map of parameters consisting of names as keys and their values.
        Returns:
        The query.

      • execute

        Query.Result<T> execute()
        Execute the query.
        Returns:
        The Query.Result of the query.
